item.description:
Our meetup is designed to help people who are going through separation and divorce find hope and healing. Join our meet up group to connect with other members who are going through or have been through separation and divorce.
Those of us going through separation or divorce face a lot of pain and need support to get better. Group meet ups are structured to allow for discussion and sharing. We will watch videos and focus on topics such as: what is happening to me, the road to healing / finding help, anger, depression, loneliness, what does the owner's manual say, new relationships, finances, kid care, single sexuality, forgiveness, reconciliation, and moving on growing closer to God.
The meetup events will be presented from a Christian perspective, however all are encouraged and invited to attend. We meet up in downtown Boston.
item.name: Boston Divorced and Separated
